title: i want to know how much i spend in game
body:
i want to know how much i spend in game but you changed some Thing so other web Sites cant see this stats anymore.
pls Change it again or tell me were i can see that ...

replies.body:
If you're looking to check how much you've spent on League of Legends on this account, check out the Riot Games Privacy site:

http://privacy.riotgames.com

It'll tell you how much you've spent, with a breakdown by currency. I hope that answers your question!
